h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 4 Secret Area
content: The secrets continue into Chapter 4 of Black Myth: Wukong, with an entire hidden area called the Purple Cloud Mountain to discover. If you want to be able to access this, there are actions you'll need to take early on in the level, which involve defeating the Venom Doaist mini-boss. Want to know the right path to follow in the Webbed Hollow to get started? Here's how to do it.
promot:

The content is as follows:
The secrets continue into Chapter 4 of Black Myth: Wukong, with an entire hidden area called the Purple Cloud Mountain to discover. If you want to be able to access this, there are actions you'll need to take early on in the level, which involve defeating the Venom Doaist mini-boss. Want to know the right path to follow in the Webbed Hollow to get started? Here's how to do it.
